pageContext.claim: “AOC plus three will run the climate policy.”
pageContext.analysis: There’s no reason to believe that Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez (D-Ny.) — or Rep. Ilhan Omar (D-Minn.), Rep. Ayanna Pressley (D-Mass.), Rep. Rashida Tlaib (D-Mich.) — would be in charge of climate policy during a Biden administration. All four freshman congresswomen support the Green New Deal, for which Biden does not advocate.
